title: What are the items that McAfee (MFE) removes from GAAP Net Income in calculating Non-GAAP Net Income for the year 2009? What is the dollar impact of each of these? Express the answer in $M rounded to 2 decimal places of precision
description:
1) Identify all of the listed adjustments to GAAP net income to retrieve for FY2009 GAAP net income:
 
 2) Stock-based compensation expense +$109094
 
 3) Amortization of purchased technology +$77961
 
 4) Amortization of intangibles +$40718
 
 5) Acquisition-related costs +34448
 
 6) Restructuring costs +13830
 
 7) litigation related costs +5525
 
 8) Loss on sale of assets +474
 
 9) Sum all the impacts together to get 282.05M and round each individual figure to the nearest 2 decimals
answer: Items removed from GAAP Net Income for FY2009 and their impacts (in $M): Stock-based compensation expense +$109.09M; Amortization of purchased technology +$77.96M; Amortization of intangibles +$40.72M; Acquisition-related costs +34.45M; Restructuring costs +13.83M; litigation related costs +5.53M; loss on sale of assets +0.474M; total impact is 282.05M
